snippet: Meet the real estate broker’s interns: an ambitious group willing to do anything, earn nothing and wake up early on a Sunday to fluff the couch cushions at open houses.
abstract: The Appraisal column notes that career of New York City real estate agent, once associated with racks of keys and dingy apartments, has taken on glamorous new image and begun attracting interns to field who are willing to work for free.
lead_paragraph: Meet the real estate broker’s interns: an ambitious group willing to do anything, earn nothing and wake up early on a Sunday to fluff the couch cushions at open houses.

headline.seo: Unpaid Interns Enter the World of Real Estate
headline.main: So Eager to Get Foot in Real Estate’s Door, They Work Without Pay
headline.print_headline: So Eager to Get a Foot In Real Estate’s Door, They Work Without Pay
